item.title: Trump’s Return Brought Stiff Headwinds for Clean Energy. So Why are Advocates Optimistic in 2026?
item.description: Industry professionals say clean energy must expand to lower consumer utility bills.

item.title: Paraplegic Engineer Becomes the First Wheelchair User to Blast Into Space
item.description: Retired SpaceX executive Hans Koenigsmann sponsored her trip with Jeff Bezo’s Blue Origin.

item.title: Elon Musk Becomes First Person Worth $700 billion Following Pay Package Ruling
item.description: A previous ruling calling Musk’s pay package ‘improper and inequitable’ was rescinded.

item.title: Profit First Doesn’t Mean Margin Last. Here’s How to Build a Margin-First Mindset
item.description: When you protect your margins, you protect your future.

item.title: Fed’s Hammack Signals Holding Rates Steady for Months
item.description: The effects of tariffs and price inflation will be more visible in the spring.
